title: General
stimulusHtml:
Evolving population (2 points maximum)

  • Allelic frequency changes or five conditions that do not change if population is not evolving

  • Means of measurement/detection
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

Evolving population (2 points maximum)

  • Allelic frequency changes or five conditions that do not change if population is not evolving

  • Means of measurement/detection

Student response earns one of the available points.

  • Means of measurement/detection

Student response earns two of the available points.

  • Allelic frequency changes or five conditions that do not change if population is not evolving

  • Means of measurement/detection

Student response earns three of the available points.

Evolving population (2 points maximum)

  • Allelic frequency changes or five conditions that do not change if population is not evolving

  • Means of measurement/detection

Student response earns four of the available points.
